attributes.action: Create a 3 day weekend every 8 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in England are continually been asked to work more and more hours than those in other European countries as well as less public holidays. Its now time to give the hard working citizens of the United Kingdom the break we all so throroughly deserve. I Craig Burke purpose a 3 day weekend every 8 weeks, every vote on this petition is a reminder to the UK government that we are only human and need the equivalent rest to that of our European friends.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
